name: Kromaticube - One Level Edition
description:
KROMATICUBE - One Level Edition is a special short edition of the game KROMATICUBE. This version is a demo of KROMATICUBE and also a game made for the One Minute Game Jam hosted on itch.io.

KROMATICUBE - One Level Edition is a simple arcade game where you have to avoid obstacles while listening to chiptune musics. Stay alive for at least 60 seconds to complete the game. It is designed for tryharder gamers and all retro gaming lovers.

KROMATICUBE - One Level Edition contains only one level while KROMATICUBE contains six levels.
